name: Limited Space (Fulmen)
description:
A lonely guy’s life gets shaken up suddenly when he finds an alien in his room.

LIMITED SPACE  is a short visual novel that features three routes with three endings.

This project was made in a 1-week Gamejam and it‘s my first visual novel!

Feel free to give me feedback and please let me know if you find any bugs.

I hope you have fun playing :)

Find me on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/fulmen.draws/?hl=de
